page.title: Quantifiers and QP - Testing
page.instruction:
Run the file qtest.txt through your morphological parser and then run the syntactic parser on the output. Check the log browser for the results and note any changes you need to make to the lexicon or to answers about the order of elements in the phrase structure rules. Make the changes as needed and rerun.
(Note: some examples cannot be tested until you complete the 'Simple and Possessed Nominal Phrases' section.)
Please check off this section now in 'Contents' and then proceed to the Adverbs and AdvP section when you are ready.
